title: PBE RP & Blue Essence
body: I got my PBE account and downloaded and installed it last night and just signed back into it and I still have 0 RP and 0 Blue essence. Is it still not loading in for me or is it a glitch for other players also?

replies.body: You should receive a stipend daily around noon pacific. More info here in a recent [pbe thread](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence)!

Yo , I have that bug too !!!! 
Still 0 RP 0 Blue Essence I don't get it :(
happen to me too, i also played a game and didnt receive and rewards

> [{quoted}](name=Rocky2000,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aFbz8ygX,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-17T10:40:07.319+0000)
>
> I got my PBE account and downloaded and installed it last night and just signed back into it and I still have 0 RP and 0 Blue essence. Is it still not loading in for me or is it a glitch for other players also?

me too
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
It just isnt loading. Buy something then it will load :)
